comments:
I20040210-2000

1. select a project
2. right-click->properties
3. select Builders
4. click New
5. observe "Graphic is disposed" error in ErrorLog
6. the Config dialogue is now hosed, forced quit of Eclipse is sometimes needed.

I do not believe this is a regression so I propose we fix ASAP in M8.

It is a regression from M6 and the fix is trivial...we were reusing a label 
provider and it was getting disposed. On the Mac this means that the images are 
gone leading to the walkback and trouble.

Fixed in BuilderPropertyPage.
This seems to be the same as bug #51100
Chris and I verified that the problem is fixed.
